name: Marble (OeAtsu)
description:
A student project carried out in 2018.

Marble is a quick narrative story about a robot who has to clean and re-orbit space trash for Human inner peace.

The space key allows you to able/disable the gravity applied on the marble, use that to progress in the level.

Team : Nathan Mendes / Youri Charbonnel

The OST credits belong to Ben Prunty and Omega
